# Inline at Boundaries

## Start of Paragraph

**Bold at very start** then normal text continues.

*Italic at very start* then normal text continues.

`Code at very start` then normal text continues.

[Link at very start](https://example.com) then normal text continues.

## End of Paragraph

Normal text then ends with **bold at end**

Normal text then ends with *italic at end*

Normal text then ends with `code at end`

Normal text then ends with [link at end](https://example.com)

## Start of List Item

- **Bold start** of item
- *Italic start* of item
- `Code start` of item
- [Link start](https://x.com) of item

## End of List Item

- Item ends with **bold end**
- Item ends with *italic end*
- Item ends with `code end`
- Item ends with [link end](https://x.com)

## In Headers

## **Bold in Header**

## *Italic in Header*

## `Code in Header`

## Start and End Same

**Entire bold paragraph**

*Entire italic paragraph*

`Entire code paragraph`

## Adjacent to Punctuation

(**Bold in parens**)

"*Italic in quotes*"

[`Code in brackets`]

## With Numbers

1**st** place

2*nd* place

3`rd` place

## Multi-line Context

First line with **bold
continuing** to second line.

Start *italic
and end* on next line.
